title: Papi Chispa - Cartas del Deseo
description: An interactive AI-powered tarot experience that merges ancient symbolism with modern generative language models — offering nuanced, personal readings through a mystical, meditative UI.
pitch: Papi Chispa reimagines the age-old practice of tarot divination for the digital age — a mystical web application that speaks like a real tarot reader, thanks to the power of generative AI. Rather than generic fortune-cookie results, Papi delivers context-aware, insightful readings in a clean, calming interface. It bridges old-world symbolism and cutting-edge technology to create a truly personal, immersive experience.
challenge:
- Designing prompts and system messages to encourage creative, human-like interpretations of cards while staying contextually accurate.
- Ensuring users feel each reading is specific to them — not a prewritten blurb.
- Creating an interface that complements the spiritual tone while remaining accessible and responsive across devices.
- Balancing simplicity in UX with the rich symbolism of tarot.
development:
- Crafted a fine-tuned prompt and memory architecture for the Gemini API that understands the interplay between tarot cards.
- Developed a minimalist front-end with vanilla JS, HTML5, and CSS Grid to keep the app light yet responsive.
- Designed a meditative UI theme, employing calming colors and accessible contrast while embracing mystical motifs.
- Optimized UX for mobile and desktop alike, including ARIA support for screen readers and WCAG compliance.
- User tested with both tarot enthusiasts and first-time users to refine tone and flow.
outcome:
- Avg. session time: 5+ minutes — a clear sign of user engagement.
- Users praised the depth and authenticity of AI-generated readings.
- Positive feedback highlighted the intuitive, calming UI and its harmony with the spiritual theme.
- Sparked conversations about integrating AI into other spiritual and creative tools.
